thread.title: STEPHANIE

author: STEPHANIE
title: STEPHANIE
text: Vitaly help me to find the cheapest flights USA - Switzerland. He call me and e-mail me a few times and we do all the steps together (my English is not very good and I was afraid to book something wrong). I immediately check on United.com with the reservation number he gave me : it's booked ! He's very professional and friendly. I would like to go back again this year in Switzerland : I will look for him.
